name: AJAIB
description: BNB Sent to this contract will be used to automatically buy the specified token and deliver it to an input address. Decreases the price islands of exchanges if there is a PCS transfer tax.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when dVIX is burned and removed of stake.

eventDecorators.name: SentTokenToRecipient
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when dVIX is burned and removed of stake.

eventDecorators.name: SwappedTokensForTokenForRecipient
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when dVIX is burned and removed of stake.

functionDecorators.name: buyTokenSendToAddress
functionDecorators.description: Buys specified token and sends it to the recipients BEP20 Address.

functionDecorators.name: buyTokesWithTokensAtAddress
functionDecorators.description: Buys specified token with an additional token, if the pairing for the two exists, and sends it to the recipients BEP20 Address.

functionDecorators.name: getContractBNBBallance
functionDecorators.description: Amount of BNB in this contract.

functionDecorators.name: getOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the owner of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenBalanceInContract
functionDecorators.description: Amount of Tokens owned by this contract.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setUniswapV2Router
functionDecorators.description: Updates the Uniswap Router and Uniswap pairing for BNB In Case of migration.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
